body_html: This was intended for precision based on Top K recommendations (Top K highest probability of being class 1 returned). I realise now that the nn.top_k used within tf.metrics.precision_at_k means something different, and so k has to be <= last dimension of the predictions. I'll have to write a custom metrics function.

body: This was intended for precision based on Top K recommendations (Top K highest probability of being class 1 returned). I realise now that the nn.top_k used within tf.metrics.precision_at_k means something different, and so k has to be <= last dimension of the predictions. I'll have to write a custom metrics function.
